name: macuse-mcp
description: Connect AI assistants to native macOS apps and UI automation.
long_description: Macuse is a macOS MCP server for Calendar, Mail, Reminders, Notes, Messages, Contacts, Maps, and UI automation. All processing runs locally. Use this bundle to connect Claude Desktop to Macuse via OAuth.

macuse_binary.title: Binary Path
macuse_binary.description: Path to the Macuse executable (default shown).
